data.title: Largs - TV Host Mike Brewer visits Nardini's during Wheeler Dealers visit
data.meta_description: TV host Michael Brewer was visiting Largs this morning and popped into Nardini's Cafe during a quick visit.
data.text:
The presenter of Quest TV's Wheeler Dealers told viewers on the clip that he was visiting the east coast of Scotland but was quickly corrected by fans of the show.

Michael is an English car trader turned presenter of motoring television programmes. He currently presents Wheeler Dealers on the Discovery Channel with Marc Priestley.

During the short video clip, Michael pointed over to the isle of Cumbrae and Arran said: "I am in a place called Largs - and there are all the islands with all the distilleries including Arran and places like that.

Largs is a lovely nice week town with a lovely church (St Columba's Parish) and I am about go to into (Nardini's) ice cream parlour for a coffee.

"I am up early on the hunt for cars which is good and I have tracked the couple down and I hope to do a deal later. Ta-ra!"
